Water Monitoring System

This application presents a design for real-time monitoring system that tracks water temperature and the quantity usage of water using Internet of Things (IoT). The system incorporates sensors for measuring the physical attributes of water, including a water temperature sensor and a water flow rate sensor.

Sign-up
Water Monitoring System is here to assist you in monitoring and managing your water consumption effortlessly. With cutting-edge technology and user-friendly features, our system offers real-time data and valuable insights to promote water conservation and minimize wastage

1. Real-time Monitoring

The app continuously collects and displays real-time data on water temperature and usage, allowing users to stay updated on current conditions.

2. Data Visualization

The app presents water monitoring data in an intuitive and visual manner, such as graphs or charts, to facilitate easy interpretation and analysis.

3. Alerts and Notifications

The app sends alerts and notifications to users when certain thresholds or predetermined conditions are met, enabling timely responses to critical changes in water temperature or usage.
